Anggota Dilaporkan ke BK DPRD DKI, PSI Minta Salinan Laporan
04 Nov 2019, 22:49 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) sudah mengetahui anggotanya, William Aditya Sarana, dilaporkan ke Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD DKI Jakarta karena mengunggah rencana anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82 miliar. Mereka sedang meminta konfirmasi kepada BK DPRD DKI.
"Sudah tahu, (tapi) belum mau berkomentar. Kita sedang meminta salinan laporan," ucap Ketua Fraksi PSI DPRD DKI Jakarta, Idris Ahmad, saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).
Idris mengaku akan mengikuti semua aturan dan proses di BK DPRD DKI. "(Itu) pasti ikuti," kata Idris.
Sebelumnya, warga DKI bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan anggota DPRD William Aditya Sarana kepada BK DPRD DKI Jakarta. Dia dianggap melanggar kode etik karena mengunggah rencana anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82,8 miliar.
"Bapak William Aditya Sarana diduga melanggar kode etik, karena mengunggah rencana KUA-PPAS ke media sosial. Sedangkan rencana KUA-PPAS itu belum dibahas di forum DPRD atau masih dalam pembahasan dalam rapat-rapat komisi atau rapat Banggar DKI Jakarta," ucap Sugiyanto dalam keterangannya.
Sugiyanto pun menyebut William mengadakan konferensi pers soal temuan anggaran tersebut. Akhirnya, pembahasan soal anggaran lem Aibon ramai dibahas oleh masyarakat.
"Akibat dari publikasi tersebut oleh Bapak William di media sosial dan dilakukan konferensi pers. Maka menimbulkan persepsi negatif dan kehebohan di publik sampai saat ini," kata Sugiyanto.
Sementara itu, Ketua BK DPRD DKI Jakarta Achmad Nawawi mengatakan telah menerima laporan tersebut. Dia akan segera menggelar rapat untuk membahas masalah itu.
"Iya betul. Besok (5/11) akan saya rapatkan (di) Dewan (Badan, red) Kehormatan, besok rapat," ucap Achmad saat dihubungi terpisah.

(aik/jbr)

Members Reported to BK DPRD DKI, PSI Asks for Copies of Reports
Nov 04 2019, 22:49 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - The Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI) has learned that its member, William Aditya Sarana, was reported to the DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Board (BK) for uploading an Aibon glue budget plan of Rp. 82 billion. They are asking for confirmation from the BK DPRD DKI.
"Already know, (but) do not want to comment. We are asking for a copy of the report," said Chairman of the PSI Faction of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Idris Ahmad, when contacted by AFP on Monday (11/04/2019).
Idris claimed to be following all the rules and processes in the BK DPRD DKI. "(It) must follow," said Idris.
Previously, a DKI resident named Sugiyanto reported a DPRD member William Aditya Sarana to the DKI Jakarta DPRD BK. He is considered to have violated the code of ethics for uploading a budget plan for Aibon glue of Rp. 82.8 billion.
"Mr. William Aditya Sarana is suspected of violating the code of ethics, because he uploaded the KUA-PPAS plan to social media. While the KUA-PPAS plan has not been discussed in the DPRD forum or is still being discussed in commission meetings or the Jakarta Banggar meeting," said Sugiyanto in his statement.
Sugiyanto also mentioned that William held a press conference about the findings of the budget. Finally, discussions about the Aibon glue budget were discussed by the public.
"As a result of the publication by Mr. William on social media and conducted a press conference. So it raises negative perceptions and excitement in the public to date," said Sugiyanto.
Meanwhile, Chairman of the DKI Jakarta DPRD BK Achmad Nawawi said he had received the report. He will soon hold a meeting to discuss the matter.
"That's right. Tomorrow (5/11) I will close (the) Honorary Council (Agency), tomorrow the meeting will be held," Achmad said when contacted separately.

(aik / jbr)
